title: Flex que PLAT 3+ !
body:
Trying to get a Flex 5v5 team going on ( since match making is fucking mental grouping players from unranked - challenger ) 

Currently looking for players to fill the following roles :
Jungle
ADC
Support 

Soloq rank Plat 3 + ( Nobody lower ) , flex rating can be from Gold - Diamond though  Granted your soloq ranking is still plat 3 + 



Looking for serious players that want to climb only ... Don't have time for people that pull the whole " its flex que who cares crap "
